field.name: description
field.value:
From http://forum.castleproject.org/posts/list/0/544.page
"La méthode 'get_Type' du type 'Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity.CustomDirectives.BlockComponentDirective' de l'assembly 'Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.NVelocity, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=407dd0808d44fbdc' n'a pas d'implémentation
In short words this exception says that there is no implementation for method "get_type" of "BlockComponentDirective". However when I disassemble the assembly I find a correct implentation for this method."
